This exceptional item holds significant value to us at $1,200,000, reflecting its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship. Given its immense worth to you, we are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This represents a remarkable saving and an excellent chance to secure such a valuable asset at a favorable rate. We believe this offer presents a compelling proposition, allowing you to benefit from the unparalleled quality and prestige associated with our product. Should you choose to accept, we assure you of a seamless transaction and exceptional customer service throughout the process. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of serving you soon. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
